document_data.name: Matilda's Boarding House
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite organized play/LC/The Good, the Undead, and the Ugly|10}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Matilda's Boarding House''' was one of few businesses that offered lodgings in the town of [[Mossbridges]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Servies: Matilda's Boarding House offered apartments priced at two [[silver]] [[coin|pieces]] per night per person; morningfeast included in the price.
document_data.History: In the late 14{{th}} century DR, the Boarding House was run by the woman named [[Matilda (Mossbridges)|Matilda]].
